titles.title: Housing Opportunities for Migrant Employees
To amend the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act relating to farm worker housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 8/5/1999--Introduced. Housing Opportunities for Migrant Employees - Amends the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act to: (1) exempt farm worker housing which is regulated or approved for health and safety by a Federal or a State agency from regulation under the housing safety and health provisions of such Act; (2) require health and safety compliance with Federal or (currently and) State standards; and (3) exempt an owner from liability for housing conditions caused by the migrant workers.
